title: Funding source for
description: Explain how you’re paying for this order

questions.mainAdvice: Is General Medical Services (GMS) your only source of funding for this order?

insetAdvice: We can only process your order if you’re paying for it in full using GMS funding. You’ll need to create a separate order for any items that are being paid for using a different funding source.
Once your order is completed, you'll be able to get a copy of your order summary to include in the contract you send to the supplier.

errorMessages.SelectFundingSourceRequired: Select yes if GMS is your only source of funding for this order
